entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:11 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 2:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
